about_the_game:
Withering Rooms is a challenging 2.5D horror RPG set in a procedurally generated Victorian mansion that changes each night. Explore Mostyn House to collect the perfect items for your build and face a huge cast of overgrown undead, invisible ghosts, devious witches, and more.

Soundtrack includes both 320kbps MP3s and 16-bit FLACs.

All tracks written & recorded by Moonless Formless
except
"Beast's Blood" written & recorded by Dan Bruington
"Margaret Plays Bach" written by Johann Sebastian Bach

Cello played by ninaredbow
Violin played by Chris Sugarev
Choir played by Dana West
